casebody.data:
DESMOND
v.
The NEWS & OBSERVER PUBLISHING COMPANY, et al. 132P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 John A. Bussian, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The News And Observer Publishing Company, et al. James T. Johnson, Chynna T. Smith, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, for Desmond, Beth William M. Wilson, III, Attorney at Law, for Professor William Van Alstyne

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of May 2018 by Professor William Van Alystne for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
